about_the_game:
“With an analog camera, a gift from my father, a photo of the missing tourists and the illusion of my first big news I prepare to enter with the brothers to the enigmatic baptistery.”

Try to escape the nightmare and prove the disappearance of the tourists, but be careful, there are terrors beyond human comprehension inside the Baptistery.

Nostalgic graphics with a modern twist

The baptistery gets a new lease of life thanks to the use of graphics inspired by the PS1 era, but with modern touches that enhance the gaming experience.

Ambience above all else

Through the use of a specifically designed soundtrack and sound effects for the environment and the visuals you will feel like you are inside the Baptistery itself.

Investigate, defend yourself, but above all run.

The camera will be your greatest ally, with it you will be able to collect the necessary evidence to be able to write your first big news, but it will also be your only help when you have to face the dangers that lie in wait. Be careful, the reels have a limited number of photos and the light of a candle does not last forever.

Reinvented history

Enjoy an original story inspired by real events. Because who wouldn't like it?

content_descriptors.notes: Mild scenes of violence and mature language.
